code: import React,{Component}from"react";import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import Slider1 from"../../assets/images/slider1.jpg";import Slider2 from"../../assets/images/slider2.jpg";import Slider3 from"../../assets/images/slider3.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class HomeSlider extends Component{render(){var settings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,autoplay:true,autoplaySpeed:3000,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,initialSlide:0,arrows:false,responsive:[{breakpoint:1024,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,infinite:true,dots:true}},{breakpoint:600,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,initialSlide:2}},{breakpoint:480,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1}}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full px-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Slider,{...settings,className:"mx-auto max-w-screen-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"slider-img",src:Slider1,alt:"slider1"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"slider-img",src:Slider2,alt:"slider2"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"slider-img",src:Slider3,alt:"slider3"})})]})});}}export default HomeSlider;
